usersIdForeignKey: ALTER TABLE todos ADD COLUMN userId CHAR(36), ADD CONSTRAINT FK_UserTodos FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id);
usersFullName: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN firstName VARCHAR(255), ADD COLUMN lastName VARCHAR(255);
usersRegistrationFields: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN birthDate TIMESTAMP, ADD COLUMN gender INT CHECK (gender IN (0, 1, 3)), ADD COLUMN country VARCHAR(255), ADD COLUMN city VARCHAR(255);
